column1: What is the sum of angles in a triangle?
If a car travels 60 miles in 1 hour then how long will it take to travel 180 miles?
A train travels at 60 km/h. How far will it travel in 2.5 hours?
If 3x + 5 = 20 then what is the value of x?
The ratio of the ages of A and B is 2:3. If A is 12 years old then  how old is B?
What is the next number in the series 2 4 8 16... ?
A box contains 5 red and 7 blue balls. What is the probability of picking a red ball?
If the cost price of an item is $50 and the selling price is $60 then what is the profit percentage?
How many days are there in 3 weeks?
What is 25% of 200?
If it takes 5 workers 10 days to complete a task then how long will it take 10 workers?
A clock shows 3:15. What is the angle between the hour and the minute hand?
If a rectangle has a length of 10 cm and a width of 5 cm then what is its area?
What is the smallest prime number?
In a race, A beats B by 10 meters. If B runs 100 meters then how far does A run?
What is the LCM of 4 and 6?
A person can complete a job in 20 days. If he works for 10 days then how much of the job is left?
If the sum of two numbers is 30 and their difference is 10 then what are the numbers?
What is 9 squared?
If you roll a die then what is the probability of getting an even number?
A car depreciates in value by 10% each year. If its initial value is $20000 then what will its value be after 1 year?
